Want to work together?

I'm mainly a front-end developer but can find my way around the back-end especially if it's JavaScript. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript(ES6) and can easily deliver pixel perfect, custom made designs. I'm also familiar with front-end libraries and frameworks like Bootstrap, jQuery and Angular 2/4. For the back-end part I work with MongoDB, Node.js and Express.js. Learning new technologies has always been exciting for me, right now I'm having a look at React. I'm currently accepting new projects and would love to hear about yours. Please take a few minutes to tell me about it.
